constituent: arm, moon, month, flesh, part of the body, address, house, mailbox, evening, fingerprint
koohiiStory1: Like in Memento, I tattoo my address on my forearm flesh so I don´t forget it.
koohiiStory2: In Iraq people are having their addresses tattooed on their bodies, usually their arms, so they can be identified if they are killed. (true story).
